summary: Build a brand new e-commerce website to sell products.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal wordmark logo, warm neutral palette, transparent background (store-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero banner with abstract shopping/retail themed shapes, warm neutral palette (store-hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png)
- Simple product placeholder image (box/package illustration), neutral background (product-placeholder.dim_800x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a customer-facing storefront that lists products with key details (name, price, primary image, short description) and supports browsing/searching.
Add a product details experience that allows a user to view full product information and add a selected quantity to a cart.
Implement a shopping cart UI with the ability to update quantities, remove items, and view totals (subtotal and item count).
Implement a basic checkout flow that collects shipping/contact information and places an order (no external payment processor unless explicitly added later).
Add order history for signed-in users using Internet Identity, so customers can view their past orders and order details.
Add an admin-only product management area to create, edit, and archive/unpublish products (access controlled by a backend-admin allowlist).
Create a cohesive, distinctive visual theme for the storefront and admin area and apply it consistently (colors, typography, spacing, components). Avoid a blue/purple theme.
Add required generated static images to the frontend and use them in the UI (served from frontend/public/assets/generated), including a logo, hero banner, and a product placeholder image.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a new e-commerce website for selling products (storefront + product sales flow).
Define backend data models and APIs for Products, Carts (session/local on frontend is acceptable), and Orders with stable persistence suitable for canister upgrades.

projectName: New e-commerce website (product catalog, cart, and order checkout)
